entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
